get.summary: all products available from this producer

200.description: an array of products (without an amount)

put.summary: Update products with the given array (all of them!)

406.description: products have to be in the form of an array

parameters.name: products
parameters.description: Products to add (does not have to be in the form of an array, can also be a single product-json). The products don't have to provide a UID - the UID will be auto-generated from the product-id and the quality. Each product also has to provide a name and price!

406.description: a product with this UID (ie the provided product_id and quality) already exists

get.summary: a specific product of the producer

200.description: an array with one specific product + information

404.description: this product_uid does not exist for this producer

parameters.name: products
parameters.description: updated product (without UID - the UID is auto-generated if necessary)

404.description: product with this UID does not exist OR a product with this UID (ie the provided product_id and quality) already exists - returned if the changes of the product lead to a change in UID that would create a double UID

406.description: product has to be in the form of an array

404.description: product with this UID does not exist

get.summary: as a merchant, I want to buy a random product from the producer

parameters.name: merchant_token
parameters.description: the token of the merchant wanting to buy a product

200.description: a random product of amount 1 and with a signature for the marketplace to validate this product when the merchant wants to sell it

get.summary: As marketplace, I want to know the decryption_key used by the producer to encrypt products sold to the merchant so I can check whether a merchant is allowed to sell a specific product

marketplace_url.description: defines api endpoint url of marketplace

probability_of_sell.description: defines the probability to sell an item to a consumer

behaviors.description: defines the behaviors with their probability of occurrence

uid.description: A unique identifier for this product. Multiple products with the same UID all have the same product_id AND the same quality.

product_id.description: the product ID used to identify the product category (products with the same product ID have the same attributes BUT not necessarily the same quality)

quality.description: The quality of the product. The better the quality the higher the number and the higher the price.

amount.description: the amount of this product (only specified when product is bought)

signature.description: The encrypted hsignature ash of the product (this is used by the marketplace to validate that a merchant is allowed to sell this product). When decrypted reads as "{uid} {amount} {time in ms when product was sent to merchant}".

decryption_key.description: the decryption_key used to encrypt the products sold to the merchant (encoded in Base64)

code.description: currently equivalent to the HTTP status code

message.description: a more detailled message about the error
